description: Gale Glory is The father of Haru and Cattleya. He along with King formed Demon Card to protect the people from demons but left because of their conflicting ideals. After leaving Demon Card he met Sakura on Garage Island where they started a family. When Haru was still young, Gale left Garage Island to search for Rave and put an end to King`s corrupt ways. His wife Sakura Glory, who was a native to Garage Island was killed by King as payback for what the Imperial forces did to his wife and son when Gale reported him. Haru is reunited with Gale at the Tower of Din where they together fight King. After the battle both Gale and King die settling their dispute.
name: Gale Glory
